mapper.select: SELECT mov_code, mov_title, mov_director, mov_genre, mov_rate, mov_time , mov_opening, mov_regdate, mov_end FROM movieforest.movie ORDER BY mov_opening ASC, mov_title ASC
SELECT mov_code, mov_title, mov_opening, mov_img FROM movieforest.movie
SELECT mov_code, mov_title, mov_opening, mov_img, mov_rate FROM movieforest.movie WHERE DATE(mov_opening) > DATE(now()) AND (mov_end <> 'END') ORDER BY mov_opening ASC, mov_title ASC

SELECT A.mov_code, mov_title, mov_img, mov_rate, ifnull(sum(res_count),0) AS mov_per FROM movieforest.movie A JOIN movieforest.mov_show B LEFT JOIN movieforest.res C ON A.mov_code = B.mov_code AND B.show_code = C.show_code WHERE mov_end = 'CON' AND DATE(mov_opening) <= DATE(now()) GROUP BY mov_title ORDER BY mov_per DESC, mov_title
SELECT mov_code FROM movieforest.movie WHERE mov_code LIKE '%${value}%' ORDER BY mov_code DESC limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movieforest.movie (mov_code, mov_title, mov_content, mov_director, mov_genre, mov_rate, mov_time, mov_opening, mov_regdate, mov_img, mov_mainactor, mov_supportactor) VALUES (#{mov_code}, #{mov_title}, #{mov_content}, #{mov_director}, #{mov_genre}, #{mov_rate}, #{mov_time}, #{mov_opening}, now(), #{mov_img}, #{mov_mainactor}, #{mov_supportactor})
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(sum(res_count), 0) FROM movieforest.movie A, movieforest.mov_show B, movieforest.res C WHERE A.mov_code = B.mov_code AND B.show_code = C.show_code AND A.mov_end = 'CON'AND B.mov_code = #{mov_code}
SELECT IFNULL(sum(res_count), 0) FROM movieforest.movie A, movieforest.mov_show B, movieforest.res C WHERE A.mov_code = B.mov_code AND B.show_code = C.show_code AND A.mov_end = 'CON'
